page.title: 17Trouble with Trolls.
page.content: Trolla water is behind the school.It probaly got its name from the vikings. The vikings were very superstitious people.A viking must have drowned in the loch and the vikings didn't believe man would have done it.So they decided it was a troll(which is a little green man).Trolla water means water of the wee men.In the olden days the 20 of December was called Tammas Mass e'en which meant St.Thomas Eve.On this day the trolls were supposed to appear.Nobody dared to go out that night because they might be caught by the trolls. On one 20th of December a man set out to see his lady love in Burrafirth.Everybody warned him not to go to see her as the trolls would get him.But he didn't listen and went.From then on he was never seen again.
